=============
forms_in_tabs
=============

.. js:attribute:: forms_in_tabs

**domain**: client 

**language**: javascript

**class** :doc:`Task </refs/client/task_api>`

Description
===========

If the ``forms_in_tabs`` attribute is set and 
:doc:`forms_container <at_forms_container>` is specified the application will 
create forms in tabs.

This attribute can be set in the **Interface** tab of
:doc:`Parameters </admin/project/parameters>`.
